column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I came to this location because I was visiting my friend from Germany who was in town to run the Chicago Marathon. I told him he had to try Chicago deep dish
column2: so we choose Lou Malnati's. Now I am usually a Giordano's fan
column3: but wanted to explore Lou's. I will say there was a long wait given that it was the Chicago marathon weekend which is to be expected
column4: so we ordered and paid for our pizza right away so it would be ready by the time we were seated. We went to the bar next door and had drinks before we were ready to be seated. We were called and we went
column5: my issue is we waited another 40 minutes to get our pizza
column6: it seems that even if you order your pizza early
column7: it is not ready on time.
